project.Title: "3 + 1" Dark Soul 2 Skin + Bloodborne Skin
project.ItemDescription: Contains the following four skins: crusader, highwayman, man_at_arms, vestal. (crusader, highwayman is my old work to re-adjust) Inspired by Dark Souls II and Bloodborne. The current lack of "torture" and "heroic", I will find time to make up. After completing these skins, I may no longer manufacture the MOD (which depends on my time and interest) and thank you for your support.
